title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature does not always function as expected. To reproduce the issue: 1. Close all open editors. 2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 3. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'. 4. The expected behavior is that all saved files should be closed, but in this case, nothing happens.
SR: To reproduce the bug, follow these steps: 1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, close all editors. 2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 3. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.
